resume

CAREER OBJECTIVE:

To serve a progressive organization, that offers an opportunity for continuous improvement, learning and rewards for shouldering more responsibilities and be an important member of a team in helping the team to perform and flourish.

CAREER PROFILE:

7 years developing, maintaining and supporting web applications and application infrastructure using JAVA/J2EE, web services, custom frameworks and other related technologies.

Employment

  • Senior Software Engineer at HCL Technologies Ltd (2009 till date) for a Fortune 500
  • Banking and Insurance Co.
  • Senior Software Engineer at iTexico (2016)
